bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: DL4J: ComputationGraph.getParam can infer wrong layer name when name has underscores
bug.description: Example: getParam("block1_conv1_b") tries to get layer block1 instead of block1_conv1. Should be easy fix.

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
